Reviews.Title: “Awesome place and amazing people”
Reviews.Author: bsosale
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for our son's spring break(March 2012). We had lots of fun. The place is neat, homely. It is close to theme parks. Special thanks to Rachael, Hooshy, Ana and two other people at the breakfast place. Everything was perfect. Rachel used to bake cookies in the evening which were delicious. One day she has to make it twice as there was so much demand. Next time when I go I will not stay any other place but here. Last day we also did our laundry as they have coin laundry facility. I felt as if I was at home. Thanks to hotel staff who made our vacation a grand success. Bala

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: SuzySurrey
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 3 nights February 2012. The room was very clean and the bed was extremely comfortable. It was very quiet and the only thing about the room that I could find fault with is that the carpets could do with replacing soon although the corridor carpets appeared to be new (so maybe the rooms are next). The hotel staff were charming and helpful, the hotel is very convenient and close to restaurants and International Drive. No problems with parking. The breakfast was pretty good but would prefer fresh scrambled egg as opposed to instant (presumably out of a packet). The cookies on the reception desk on arrival were just the ticket! As regular visitors to Florida over a 30 year time span would recommend.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect Holiday Base”
Reviews.Author: shockedelicka
Reviews.Content: My family of two adults and two teenagers stayed here in June 2011. Orlando is one of our favourite holiday destinations and we have stayed in various areas and chosen different types of accommodation. We find International drive the best choice for location as you can park up and walk to the bars and restaurants in the evenings and you are just a short drive from the attractions. The Hampton Inn Orlando Convention Centre Hotel is perfectly positioned away from the main road but a quick 2 min stroll through a well lit car park to International drive. Nearby is Millers Ale House, Bahama Breeze and some other great restaurants in the Shopping Centre next door. This is a functional hotel and as a base, it was perfect if however you plan to spend time at the hotel I think you should consider other options. As a family, our Orlando holiday itinerary is always packed so this hotel suited our purpose. The rooms themselves were small and chintzy but very clean with a great shower. We also made use of the fridge, LCD TV, Iron & ironing board. This hotel includes breakfast, which was always a good spread, and there was always tea and coffee available all day and a gorgeous smell of cookies always wafted over from reception. The staff were a credit to this hotel, always smiling and very happy .Our favourites were the husband and wife team that looked after the breakfast area in the morning. Fantastic way to start the day! Facilities that we used were the washer/Dryers this saved me so much time when we got home. Computer/internet access that was available in Reception enabled the boys to keep in touch with friends and helped us to check in to our flights home. We did not use the pool or workout facilities. Reading all the reviews and posts helped me plan our holidays so I have decided to catch up and post some of my own experiences ..Enjoy your holiday if you choose this hotel you will be getting great value for money.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding Service & Accommodations”
Reviews.Author: Jeff M
Reviews.Content: I stayed for 2 nights. All employees were extremely helpful and hospitable (especially the front desk). My room was clean and comfortable making for a relaxing stay. I will definitely stay here again and highly recommend this particular Hampton Inn to others.

Reviews.Title: “Served its purpose”
Reviews.Author: brodrigo83
Reviews.Content: Stayed 1 night. Room was clean, continental breakfast was pretty good. Great location to convention center and highways.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value”
Reviews.Author: Howie089
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for a convention and did not bother to rent a car. I took the shuttle bus to and from the airport which was a good value at $30 round-trip. It took me a day or so to figure out the best way to my meeting (out the back exit and up International Drive and through the P. Hotel) and where the nearest shops were (out the back exit). Having said that, the hotel is situated in a quiet location about 15-20 min walk to the Convention Center. When I saw all the lines in the P. Hotel, I knew I had made the right choice. Right from check-in everyone was friendly and helpful. Free wifi and breakfast was great. It was also pleasant sitting by the (plain) pool. The bedroom, although dated in decor, had a comfortable bed and the flat screen TV had enough choices. My room did not have a microwave or fridge, but I see from other reviews that other rooms have these. I did not miss them as there was a Walgreens close by to pick up snacks and supplies. Many of the attractions of International Drive - movie theater, restaurants, etc are within easy walking distance. Yes, the hotel could use some renovation, but definitely excellent value and I would not hesitate to stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Camv22
Reviews.Content: This hotel a good deal if traveling in Orlando, close to the parks and convention center. The room was very clean. The complimentary breakfast was one of the better I have seen at a Hampton it included the usual waffle maker but also offered omelets, sausage, potatoes,breads, etc. If you are traveling with children this is a good way to start your day.

Reviews.Title: “Not up to Hampton Inn snuff!”
Reviews.Author: MadhatterFL
Reviews.Content: Needed to grab a night in Orlando for meetings the next day, and decided on the tried and true Hampton Inn chain. Bad choice . . . This Hampton Inn was a little more worse for wear . . . and the walls were paper thin. Every time the AC would come on it would roar. Reserved a King bed weeks ago, and ended up with two Fulls . . . room felt dirty . . . The worst pillows EVER! Lots of better choices in Orlando!

Reviews.Title: “Honeymoon in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Mark B
Reviews.Content: Good hotel. Not fancy or luxurious but clean, good facilities and great location. The staff here were great and it really seemed like they cared about us as guests. They constantly offered help and were always checking to make sure we were happy. Good breakfast with plenty of options. Lots of decent restaurants within 5 mins walk and close to major shopping areas and theme parks. I would happily stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Good base, everything handy”
Reviews.Author: diederika
Reviews.Content: Great rooms with kitchenette, very clean, a nice and quiet pool with lots of towels, a wonderful and fresh breakfast, a super location for business as well as leisure. What more can you ask for... Here you get the very friendly staff thrown in for free too!!

Reviews.Title: “Lovely”
Reviews.Author: kellyinak
Reviews.Content: After spending 4 nights in 4 different hotels considered "4 Star" by Hotwire standards, it was so nice to come to this hotel, pay the decent rate and get a clean room, with no bugs, no extra hidden fees, and friendly service. These rooms are fresh, clean, modern, and comfortable. The staff was helpful, friendly, and willing to go the extra mile. The continental breakfast was unexpected but a great way to fill up before heading out to the parks. I would DEFINITELY stay here again. In fact, avoid hotwire or priceline.... PAY what the Hampton's rates are and expect a nice stay with no surprises!

Reviews.Title: “Business Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Florida C
Reviews.Content: The staff at this property could not do enough for you. I was always greeted by name, asked if I needed anything for my meeting and had every expectation met. The hot breakfast was great, the room (king) was very comfortable and the little refrigerator was very handy. Tucked away between I-drive and the convention center, this hotel is within walking distance to everything a business traveller could need including great restaurants. Did I mention the heated pool? Perfect after a long day of meetings!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel....fantastic people!”
Reviews.Author: Trussguy
Reviews.Content: This is a top notch hotel and part of a very dependable hotel chain. Folks here go out of their way to make sure you are welcome and have everything you need! Thanks for a great place to stay!

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly, sort of old.”
Reviews.Author: Greg W
Reviews.Content: I actually moved here from one of the overpriced resort properties up the road. I always know exactly what to expect from a Hampton Inn, and this property was no exception. Although there was some confusion about my reservation, the front desk staff worked to mitigate the problem. Since I had arrived pretty early, they also offered to provide directions to some local attractions while I waited. I chose to stay on property to wait, so I was invited to enjoy the pool and fitness center. The pool is on the south side of the hotel, so gets sun for the entire day. Nice! The breakfast is Hampton Inn standard - free, hot, and tasty with a nice selection of items. My least favorite part of the stay was my room. It always felt a bit...damp, even with the air cranked. The carpets were a bit worn, etc. I think the property is an older one. If you are heading to Orlando to hit the attractions all day, you probably won't even notice. This hotel is also only about a block from I-Drive. Shopping, eats, and drinks are very accessible.

Reviews.Title: “excellent value, great location”
Reviews.Author: ECCharleston
Reviews.Content: Stayed for the second time in six months in January 2012 -- quiet location, clean hotel, good-sized rooms, full breakfast included that changes every day, best of all is the superb location half-way between Universal and Disney, walking distance to many of the International Drive restaurants, just off I-4. We had no problems either stay so had no opportunity to test the hotel's ability or willingness to handle shortcomings, but from the attitude of the staff I would guess that any problem would be quickly taken care of.

Reviews.Title: “Good sized rooms”
Reviews.Author: DoctorKeo
Reviews.Content: Good sized rooms; ours was configured with one King size bed (our choice), settee, coffee table, desk and chair, plenty of cupboard drawers, large flat screen TV, fridge and microwave. The en suite bathroom was a reasonable size, with all the usual free toiletries. The hotel location we found very central for all the theme parks, with plenty of eateries within walking distance. We liked the complimentary breakfast, which we found enough of a selection to start our day. Complimentary drinks (Tea, coffee & hot chocolate in the evenings) were available 24 hours. We also liked that we could use the dining room for lunch, where we would get a sandwich from Subways, a short walk away, as we found the portions large in most restaurants, so a light snack became a delight! We did experience a problem with the shower in our first room, but after examination of the shower, the hotel found us a couple of rooms to select from as a replacement, rather than having the plumber working in our room. The man from the front desk came and did the bulk of the moving us to the new room AND DIDNâ€™T hang around with his hand out! There appears to be a good selection of channels on the TV, for some of the evenings where we were â€˜Parked outâ€™, and could do little but crash. The complimentary wifi was fast and useful. The only real problem was the restaurant was over whelmed a few days during the Christmas period, but Iâ€™m sure that this was because some guests had a special setup for their breakfast and didnâ€™t use it. Luckily on those days the weather was nice and we had breakfast by the pool â€“ Tough life, but someone has to do it!

Reviews.Title: “manager goes above and beyond to satisfy your needs.”
Reviews.Author: mfins
Reviews.Content: Hotel is excellent and the staff is too... The manager I think her name is Ralita, is excellent.. We had a problem and she was quick to solve it.. Will come here again and again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice and affordable”
Reviews.Author: shelleynelson
Reviews.Content: We were greeted warmly. Excellent desk service. Breakfast of waffles, yogurt, toast, eggs, sausage, donuts, juice and coffee. No shuttle service, but took a taxi to Epcot for $40 one way there (there is a park entry fee of $14 included for every vehicle is why its more) and $20 on return trip. The room was clean, no issues. Comfortable bed. Used the pool which is small but pleasant. Would definitely return for a fair value room, good breakfast and easy location to international drive. Also nice running trail outside along universal blvd which is a relatively undeveloped road with nice trees, etc.

Reviews.Title: “2nd stay at this hotel! Worth every penny :)”
Reviews.Author: Littlewoodsy21
Reviews.Content: This was our 2nd time staying at this hotel and we couldn't say one bad thing about it!!! Hotel is In a great location if you have a car! Universal studios and islands of adventure about 5 mins away, and also Sea World is the same distance! Disney is about 10 mins away too!!! Lots of restaurants and entertainment near hotel and there is also lots of shopping malls close by too!! Hotel was very clean and great service from the hotel staff!! Always very pleasant and willing to help!! Breakfast served in the morning is good enough to set you up for the day :) they also have warm cookies and milk in the evening :) The hotel swimming pool was very clean and also has plenty of beds so if you feel like a chill out day away from the parks then it's a nice place to relax!!! If we every go back to Orlando in the future we will defiantly stay in this hotel again as we think it's cheap, cheerful, great location and great staff :)

Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel, no frills but price is right”
Reviews.Author: Racandtac
Reviews.Content: We stayed here to do the theme parks as did most of the other guests. It was a basic room, quiet location and the usual Hampton Inn breakfast. Fresh fruit was a bit old. Free parking and plenty of fast food outlets in this area.

Reviews.Title: “Top of the line Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: DX-Traveler
Reviews.Content: The Hampton Inn is a medium class hotel and this is a good example of that. The room was clean and of average size, with comfy beds and a medium size TV with some HD channels. The A/C is a wall unit that is medium noisy. Bathroom was clean and modern with medium towels. Internet is free, but fairly slow and requires a password (printed on the sleeve for the key). The location is excellent for walking to restaurants on International Drive as well as the Convention Center. Staff friendly and helpful. B'fast is of medium quality with some hot items that vary from day to day and bagels/pastries/cereals etc - disposable dishes and cups. Smallish outdoor pool. Free parking.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic 7 days”
Reviews.Author: onslow10
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for the past seven days.The hotel is a very short walk to i ride stops on i drive and in a great location for resturants.our favourite The Ale House.great food and great value. The hotel has realy helpful and pleasant staff who are always at hand to help and advise you. The breakfast is a great start to the day with a choice of 3 hot foods that change daily and also alongside are cakes,muffins,toast,bagles,fruit,cereals,yogurt and waffles that you make yourself (realy good fun) a choice of fruit juices,coffee,tea,hot chocolate. Hot drinks are available 24 hours and in the afternion evening homemade cookies are available free (a great treat). As i said the hotel staff are realy friendly and helpfull and i cant thank them enough. To travel to universal you can get lynx bus no 8 abd then transfer to lynx bus 37 this cost 2 dollars their and 2 dollars back. To travel to disney you get i ride to seaworld 1 dollar 25 cents and then lynx 50 from sea world to magic kingdom 2 dollars thats 6 dollars return in total which is half the cost of organised transport. You should consider booking this.hotel as its great value and very friendly staff.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service, Very Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Chris S
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Hampton Inn Orlando - Convention Center and had a great experience. The complimentary breakfast was a great way to start the day...bagels, fresh fruit, cereal, coffee, pour your own Belgian waffles, juice, and couple hot tray options that rotate daily. The first room I was assigned had a broken air conditioner, after a quick call to the front I had a manager in the room trying to resolve my issue. It couldn't be fixed right away and I was transferred to another room without any questions asked. The managers and employees at location are helpful and friendly, making the experience all that much more enjoyable.

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: Jim M
Reviews.Content: Everyone from Rachel, who checked me in, to Robert, the manager, and Stuart, the night manager made you feel at home. Great people & great experience!!!

Reviews.Title: “Our first choice hotel in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: suegfoster
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at this hotel many times over the last few years and it is always my first choice when staying in Orlando. The location is fabulous and the staff are friendly and helpful. our recent stay in November was short as we stayed only two nights prior to our cruise and one night post cruise but already looking forward to returning in April!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay”
Reviews.Author: Penny S
Reviews.Content: We stayed Thanksgiving week and had a fabulous time. All the staff we encountered from the front desk to housekeeping were helpful and cheerful. Our room was spacious with lovely comfy beds. Towels and toiletries were plentiful and re-stocked daily. We always found things we liked at breakfast and this was a big saving for us during the week's stay. The hotel is in a great location, behind I-Drive - so very quiet but close to Pointe Orlando with lots of good restaurants in easy walking distance. We travel alot and I really could not fault this hotel and the staff. Thank you

Reviews.Title: “Recent Stay at Hampton Inn Convention Center - Universal Blvd Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Apurva J
Reviews.Content: We (my wife and I) stayed at this Hampton Inn during the week of Thanksgiving in 2011. We were completely satisfied with our stay. The room was neat and clean and quite spacious. The bed was always very comfortable and clean. The bathrooms were clean and house keeping was done daily. We also got 2 complimentary bottles of water when we arrived, which was a pleasant surprise. Nanci, at the front desk was extremely helpful and took a lot of effort and time to tell us about the various attractions of the area. She was very courteous and friendly. The breakfast was good and the breakfast area was large and clean. The location of the hotel is excellent. It is just one intersection from the busy I-drive, yet the hotel itself is located on the quiet corner of universal blvd. It is pretty close to a lot of good restaurants and within 3-6 miles of the major theme parks. Parking was ample. All in all, an excellent hotel choice. We will definitely return.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, value for money!”
Reviews.Author: Joehurst74
Reviews.Content: Close to I Drive and all attractions. Great pool, l was there thanks giving week and l almost had the place to myself. While l did not have the free breakfast it did look good. Rooms were clean and quiet. Beds were very very comfortable.

Reviews.Title: “Lovely place to stay but some improvements needed”
Reviews.Author: USAFan2011
Reviews.Content: Stayed here with a friend between the 17th Nov - 24th Nov. Found all the staff to be lovely and friendly particulalry Rachel, Ana and Managers Stuart and Robert. Slept very comfortably in their fantastic beds. Reason I have not given 5 stars was because although the general cleaning was excellent there were a number of stains on our carpet and also cleaning was always done very late in the day. We would leave before 9am each morning and return at approx. 2pm to re-energise and the room was never cleaned unless we specifically asked for our room to be cleaned early. Breakfast was nice but could be improved with a better choice of items. These were our only niggles. Fantastic location. Would I recommend this hotel? Yes. Would I go back? Yes.

Reviews.Title: “A Great Place to STAY !!!”
Reviews.Author: Catherine J
Reviews.Content: The hotel was clean, the guest services reps were very welcoming and willing to help in anyway they could. Room service did excellent on cleaning the room and providing us with clean towel everyday. The hotel provided a good complete breakfast bar every morning, with reps there to assist you prepare your food.

Reviews.Title: “Great location. Perfect price/quality”
Reviews.Author: Roel19
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel based on the tripadvisor reviews and I must say, it did not let us down. The location is perfect. You are within walking distance of plenty of restaurants and some great fun attractions. Miller's Ale House is a must try restaurant and you should definitely try Dave and Busters... You've got to see it to believe it. Pirate's Cove, Wonderworks and Pointe Orlando are within walking distance as well. The hotel itself has all it needs. Free wifi, free breakfast (great waffles) and clean nicely sized rooms. Staff is very friendly and the Hotel Manager is there in the morning to great people which is very nice. I would recommend this hotel to everybody staying in Orlando. Seaworld/discovery cove, but also Universal are only 15 minutes away as are the Disney parks. The convention center is around the corner which means that the hotel will be full when there's a big convention, but the pool is as good as empty for the holiday people. Regarding price value, this hotel is the top!

Reviews.Title: “Clean Nice hotel”
Reviews.Author: AKdreaming
Reviews.Content: Great Hampton. Location wonderful, hotel clean, exceptional breakfast. Only downside was the bed was not as comfortable as I am used to Hampton Inn providing.

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inn Orlando is friendly and welcoming:)”
Reviews.Author: Barry B
Reviews.Content: This hotel deserves to be rated higher than it is due to the great work the staff do in making your stay as stress free as possible. The beds were comfortable and the towels changed daily by the friendly staff and as someone has already said Robert seemed to be at the hotel all hours to ensure your breakfast was to your satisfaction and when you returned in the evening after a long day at one of the many attractions Orlando has to offer he was there again asking how your day went. Free tea and coffee all day and cookies and milk in the evening were a great touch. The breakfast was wonderful and there was more on offer than I expected which again is a nice touch. Overall I could not fault this hotel or its staff. Great job and we would return in a heartbeat if we had the money. Thanks:))

Reviews.Title: “off the beaten track . . .”
Reviews.Author: rbfic
Reviews.Content: I chose this hotel from a convention list because it was moderately priced, had a free breakfast and free wireless internet, and was within easy walking distance of the convention center. As a frequent user of Hampton Inns for family trips I knew about what to expect, but this one exceeded my expectations. The location is ideal. The hotel is on Universal Drive, which is very quiet, but if you walk out the back door and through the parking lot, it's only about 100 yards to International Drive and lots of restaurants. So, it is out of the heavy tourist traffic but has easy access to all amenities. The quiet interior of the hotel reflects its off-the-beaten-track location. The only noise issue was the intermittent humming of the air conditioner in the room, which I handled by running only the fan at night. My room was standard Hampton - clean, comfortable. The breakfast room is large and pleasant with lots of tables and easily accommodated a mix of business and family guests. The pool area is very nicely isolated from it's surroundings and shaded on both ends by palm trees - a great place to sit and read a book or newspaper if you are not going for a swim. The staff are very attentive, both at the front desk and in the morning in the breakfast room. If I return to Orlando, this is where I will stay. It is interesting that this is the only time I have been asked by a front desk at checkout to send a review to TripAdvisor - perhaps an indication of their level of confidence in the good service they are providing. The only thing I would add at this hotel, if I had a magic wand, would be an in-room safe. The hotel naturally denies responsibility for loss of personal items and recommends storing valuables in a safe deposit box at the front desk - I did not use that service so I can't comment on how much that can accommodate, size-wise - e.g., laptop computers. However, considering the multitude of expensive electronic gadgets we carry with us these days, it would be much more convenient to store them in a room safe than stopping at the front desk each time we come and go to deposit and retrieve them. Most hotels that I stay at are equipped with small in-room safes large enough to hold a laptop and various other electronic accessories.

Reviews.Title: “Nice stay”
Reviews.Author: Mike_South_Florida
Reviews.Content: This is a nice hotel that is conveniently located just off International Drive. The rooms are welcoming and a friendly staff but they are not always as on top of things as would be expected. Free parking and a full hot breakfast are a plus.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, Nice & Good Services”
Reviews.Author: S Y
Reviews.Content: The rooms are clean. Staff was very friendly, helpful and provide good directions. The included breakfast buffet were great! The manager, Robert, who took care of the breakfast had extended good quality of services! He works hard and spends his own off-duty time to greet and serve customers. We will come back to this hotel for the next trade show in the convention center.

Reviews.Title: “Entire Stay was excellent. Staff was very helpful and courteous”
Reviews.Author: Charles R
Reviews.Content: Staff was excellent. Very Helpful and courteous. Rooms, bedding, very pleasing.

Reviews.Title: “"Great Vacation"”
Reviews.Author: Andrea W
Reviews.Content: We have stayed at the Hampton Inn on Universal Blvd on numerous occassions and were very pleased with the hotel. I chose this hotel because of it's great location near good restaurants and close to the local theme parks. The staff was very nice and knowledgeable when it came to directions and recommendations for local attractions. My family really enjoyed the complimentary breakfast, pool area and I love the large rooms and very comfortable beds. I will definatley recommend the Hampton Inn near the Convention Center to all my friends and family. Andrea W

Reviews.Title: “Great Time”
Reviews.Author: Peyton W
Reviews.Content: Staff could not have been more helpful and the hot cookies and milk were great!! Watch the staff quickly solve problems and give good directions to others.

Reviews.Title: “Great location!”
Reviews.Author: nancygSeattle
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hampton Inn on Universal Blvd. for two nights and are glad we chose this hotel. We like Hampton Inns because they have large rooms, good beds, free internet and parking... and are always clean. Our carpet looked like it was just replaced and I think the hotel is going through a remodel. The breakfast was very good and I usually don't like the complimentary breakfasts. We were very pleased with the location of the hotel....near good restaurants and close to all the major roads in the area. I recommend the Hampton Inn near the Convention Center.

Reviews.Title: “Good, clean, couple of issues.”
Reviews.Author: Tozandchip
Reviews.Content: We've stayed in The Hampton 3 times now, at least 3 weeks per visit. We first chose this hotel as we actually wanted a hotel rather than a motel style which 90% of Orlando hotels are. Rooms are great, nice and big and the best hotel beds I have ever slept in. Clean in general and kept that way with daily maid service. Location is at the better end of i-drive and a short walk through the parking lot brings you out at Bahama Breeze dominos etc Wallgreens just round the corner too. Desk staff are very helpful and there are a limited number of safety deposit boxes behind reception (which you need unfortunately). Which leads me to my main negative, theft by hotel staff/maids. We were hugely disappointed on our last day when a mobile phone was stolen from our bedside cabinet during the room being cleaned. I fear it was more than coincidence that the item was stolen on our last morning, leaving us very little time to do anything about it, we called the police but they couldn't confirm a time to meet us and we had to be at the airport. It really left a bad taste in our mouths, of what had been our favorite Orlando hotel. Desk staff were apologetic but couldn't or didn't really help in anyway, apart from investigating the matter, but again we were leaving for the airport that day. We received no apology or correspondence from the hotel with regards to any outcome. Anyway rant over, i just wanted people to be aware that this great hotel does have some issues with security.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: RNobrega
Reviews.Content: I had a very good stay. New room, kind staff and nice continental breakfast. I really enjoy it.

Reviews.Title: “Best value for money in Orlando!”
Reviews.Author: Canada420
Reviews.Content: We stayed here this September and it was not our first visit as this is the place to stay if you are on a budget or just love the area. Can't believe the price of this hotel. I usually book on Travel Republic to get the very best deals. For a budget hotel it has it all and then some. The rooms are fine and the beds and pillows lovely and comfy. Free paper at your door most mornings and a free breakfast every day with at least 3 cooked items and two waffle makers for guests to use. Add to this juice and fresh fruit and all day fresh coffee and its perfect. There is even a to-go breakfast bag for those in a rush. The hotel does get busy with convention people but that is to be expected with the centre being just minutes away. The hotel is just steps away from the quiet end of International Drive, and near Pointe Orlando and the I-Ride Trolly. Some of the guest rooms have fridge and microwave but problably have to ask for these well in advance. There is a little gym and also a small laundry for guest use. About $1.50 ish per machine. We love this hotel, and not just for the cost. The staff are very welcoming and you will often see someone from management talking to guests at the breakfast buffet. A few years ago this hotel was our little secret but now that it appears in UK brochures word has got out, so don't be surprised if you meet up with other British tourists there enjoying the benefits we have had to ourselves all these years. Thanks to all staff, see you again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Nice place to stay for the Convention Center”
Reviews.Author: drj17011
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay here while visiting Orlando for a conference at the Convention Center. It's about a 15 minute walk with an option of heading down International Drive where there are lots of restaurants or Universal Blvd which is a bit more direct. Check in was friendly and efficient. Room was fine. Free Wifi worked very well although the initial log on needed a call to a friendly 1-800 help desk. After that it worked without a glitch although a daily logon was necessary. Standard Hampton Breakfast and the evening cookies were a nice treat. Didn't use the pool or exercise facilities. I would definitely stay here again for a meeting.

Reviews.Title: “Great holiday”
Reviews.Author: martgr10
Reviews.Content: This hotel keeps up the Hampton standard. Clean tidy, nice pool and helpful staff. A great location for the theme parks.

Reviews.Title: “Should be a 5”
Reviews.Author: leedylan1998
Reviews.Content: Strange one to review this. Front desk on arrival was very helpful. Nothing seemed to be any bother, got us checked in fine, got me a safe key for free and gave us all the information re the Free breakfast which was a god send in the morning before setting off to the parks. Actually, all the staff were a delight in the hotel. I had heard that rooms in Orlando arent that great so wasnt expecting a huge deal and didnt get a huge deal. It was clean enough, though it clearly wasnt big enough for 2 adults and 2 x 13 year old boys so they ended up sleeping on the floor for 7 days, something that they were happy to do, even if i wasnt so comfortable with it. Air conditioning was very, and i mean very noisy. Was also stuck at a set temperature. Pool wasnt busy and was good to relax at each end of the day. Review above would normally be less than 4 but there was something about the hotel and i would most defo stay there again. Sort out the air-con and it could get the final 1/5th vote. Couple of tips for people for night time. Out the back door and head up in the direction of TGI Fridays then turn left. Across the road and down a bit you have Houlihans which had great food then head back towards the hotel to Dave & Busters where the kids can play all night in the arcade for $50 while the adults sit and have a few beers and drinks at reasonable prices whilst watching plenty of US Sports or music. Im afraid we only found these on the last night so check them out early doors :-)

Reviews.Title: “Couldn't be better :))))”
Reviews.Author: MarianaGomes
Reviews.Content: Me and my boyfriend, we stayed for 14 days and couldn't have been better. Starting with the location, excellent. We were surrounded by many restaurants and shopping that we could go on foot also close to all Disney parks and Universal. About the people of the hotel, either at the reception, at breakfast, housekeeping ... all very friendly, polite and always treated us very well. Our room always neat, clean and fragrant. The Breakfast was very good compared with other times I was in Orlando but at other hotels. We were fortunate to sunny days and we could enjoy the pool, which was very relaxing. I have nothing to complain about, it was perfect!!! Super good! Best Regards, Mariana Gomes.

Reviews.Title: “Good friendly service”
Reviews.Author: Bingleytraveller
Reviews.Content: Excellent stay , friendly service , Free breakfast was perfect for us bagels and fruit yogurt ( we don't do cooked ) unlimited coffee any time what a great idea, This hotel is a short walk from restraunts and bars at pointe Orlando the walk is through a well lit parking lot with appartments so we felt safe and could leave the car behind and have a good evening out .

Reviews.Title: “Close to everything!”
Reviews.Author: SouthBuffaloGirl
Reviews.Content: I recently stayed here with my family and it was everything I expected from a Hampton. Loved having free breakfast! This hotel was close to Universal which is a plus after spending the whole day there it was a short drive home when we were all exhausted! The staff were all very friendly and helpful with directions. You can walk right out the back door and go to a lot of restaurants which is a plus! Plus the pool was clean and usually empty as most families were probably visiting the local tourist attractions.

Reviews.Title: “Sharron Savage from Sussex”
Reviews.Author: Sharron s
Reviews.Content: After staying here last year, I knew the hotel was good. I was impressed, it was better!! The staff were friendly, and the service was excellent all round. The standard of cleanliness was exceptional, with the rooms being thoroughly cleaned every day. A good choice of food is provided every day for breakfast, and there is plenty of it. Internet access is provided free of charge, which was great for checking the football and rugby scores. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone. It provides excellent accommodation and service for a reasonable cost. The night life and entertainment of I- Drive is only 5 minutes walk away, which is far enough for a quiet nights sleep. I would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: MarkFromFullerton
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here a few times on business. I love that fact that parking, breakfast and internet are free. I was at the Boca Raton Resort the week before and paid for breakfast as well as a valet fee and a resort fee. While the grounds, rooms and view were extremely nice I'd rather have the extra money to spend on other things. The staff at the Hampton Inn have always been courteous and helpful. This will continue to be my first choice for the Orlando area.

Reviews.Title: “Best Value”
Reviews.Author: Wallace Novaes C
Reviews.Content: Just returned to Brazil from a 15 days vacation togheter with my wife and two daughters. The hotel is very well located, you can walk to eat and shop. The staff are very friendly, and cooperative, breakfast is great, cookies at 5PM, excellent pool, very neat and well maintained instalations, free internet. Is really worth to stay there, next visit we will stay there again for sure. Thanks to all the staff that received and treated us so well, represented by Mr. Blomberg. Congratulations!

Reviews.Title: “The Greatest Experience Ever”
Reviews.Author: Iris C
Reviews.Content: This was my first time staying at the Hampton Inn & I truly enjoyed my stay here. The hotel was very nice, clean & comfortable. I certainly enjoyed the delicious coffee that was available all day & night. The breakfast was always hot & fresh. The staff was so wonderful & friendly. They really made the stay even better for me. The atmosphere was truly remarkable & if I ever visit this area again I will definitely be staying here & I would also recommend this hotel to anybody that will be traveling in the area again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location - Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: JCEire
Reviews.Content: We (two adults) stayed there last week. Location is great, close to the Convention Centre and backing onto I-Drive (3 min walk to Pointe Orlando). Staff are very helpful, and the hotel is clean and well maintained. Pool was lovely and the laundry facilities and free internet access are botha big plus. Next time in Orlando, this will be our base. Would heartily recommend it!

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed!”
Reviews.Author: carmurfy
Reviews.Content: Me and other half have just returned from 9 night stay in this hotel and have to say everything was perfect about this hotel. We noticed alot of business people stayed there too which meant pool was never busy, never seen more than 3 people at the pool at one time. Check in was very pleasant and efficient, free cookies at reception was a nice touch too (and fresh). Room was spacious and bathroom clean and well stocked with towels, shampoo etc. Breakfast was free and changed every few days, scrambled eggs, pancakes, omelette, fruit, cereal, muffins, yogurts etc.. Laundry load cost $1.75 in the self service machines, same for detergent. Location was perfect too, out the back door and 3 mins walk to I-Drive, could not ask for more from this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Super i drive hotel”
Reviews.Author: ricknsal
Reviews.Content: Second trip to this hotel for our florida holiday, stayed first two nights and last three nights of our florida tour whilst flying in and out of orlando. great value for money, just a quick stroll to i drive where we found a new favourite restaurant in millers ale house, great menu and superb value. Only down side to the hotel is there are no room safes which can be a bind if you are just arriving, although there is a security box at the front desk which we used on our first visit they were all taken this time ( for our entire stay ) That said, breakfast great and friendly staff. We,ll definately use again

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location and friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: donz23
Reviews.Content: Hotel is in excellent location just behind International Drive, can walk through the car park to get to I Drive to some excellent restaurants and attractions such as Bahama Breeze, TGI's, Olive Garden, Tony Romas, Pirates Adventure Golf and Pointe Orlando. There's also a 24 hr Walgreens just down from TGI's. Not too far from Universal and Disney - hire a car! Hotel staff friendly and polite, especially Robert who came over to talk to us everyday at breakfast and asked how we were and what we were doing that day, very nice. Room was nice although we did asked to be moved on our first day - first room had 2 double beds and no fridge (had requested by email and telephone a king bed and fridge!) and also felt quite small. Lady on reception managed to find us another room that met our needs and it had a sofa area so much nicer. Beds were soooo comfy and rooms cleaned well every day. Breakfast was fine, more continental as only 2 hot items per day which were ok and a waffle maker.

Reviews.Title: “Excellant Customer Service With A Smile”
Reviews.Author: M D
Reviews.Content: I booked my trip and when I arrive I was greeted with a smile. They have wonderful rates and clean rooms. That is very important to me to get a room for my family and not break the bank. I was there with my family and we had so much fun. It is close to shopping and not too far from Disney. I loved the staff and I felt right at home with the manager Stuart Bloomberg. He told us if there was anything wrong during our stay that we were reassured he would take care of it. Two thumbs up for a great hotel with a great manager and staff. I would definetly stay again..

Reviews.Title: “Good value”
Reviews.Author: Sdbsjb
Reviews.Content: Very good value if booked in advance given its location near the convention centre and international drive which means easy walking distance to lots of places to eat. Even better when you look at the prices of the Hilton/Peabody which are nearbye. Breakfast as others comment is limited in variation if you are there more than one night. Friendly staff and good clean rooms. Fitness centre a little small but adequate plus free wifi.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic stay at The Hampton”
Reviews.Author: Booninchal
Reviews.Content: Had a fantastic 2 week stay at this hotel. Staff very friendly and was made to feel welcome the moment we arrived. Rachel on reception is a credit to the hotel and does her job extremely well. The breakfast each morning was okay, not great but adequate. Would of been nice to have a safe in our room but apparently there are safe deposit boxes available. Overall a great experience and would definitely stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: copuk
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the hampton for 3 weeks in september 2011, and we chose the hotel due to its excellent ratings on tripadvisor.They did not in any way disappoint. The staff were so friendly and helpful, The general manager Robert went out of his way on more than one occasion to make our stay a happy one, and the reception staff (especially Rachael) made sure our every request was dealt with in a friendly helpful manner. There are also free safes for customers to use behind reception. The location of the hotel is great, it is just off international drive so a bit quieter then being there, but a five minute walk gets you into the main area of restaurants and shops. The car park was never full and free. There was no resort fee to be paid (another deciding factor when it came to choosing the hotel) The rooms were air conditioned, clean and tidy and were serviced most days despite our leaving the room very late on some occasions. The breakfast was excellent had it had been paid for, so for free it was beyond this. There was toast, waffles, cereal, fruit, juice, tea, coffee, and something hot to choose from everyday. There was no limit on what you ate. Our room was on the fifth floor and we did not suffer from any noise problems at all. Overall our stay was a very happy one and we will definately be coming back again to see everyone.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”
Reviews.Author: jmcilveen
Reviews.Content: We were so impressed by the service, friendliness of staff and standard of cleanliness. the location was great, close to international drive yet quiet, breakfast was also good

Reviews.Title: “Great location! Close to Universal and Sea World!”
Reviews.Author: CrisDanna
Reviews.Content: The staff is very friendly, the room is clean and the location is great! Very close to the Universal parks and Sea World. It is also close to a lot of good restaurants and bars. The breakfast was amazing with a lot of options to all tastes. I loved the waffle machine!

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location at the "nicer" end of International drive”
Reviews.Author: Tracy Y
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, very clean, staff friendly, excellent "free" breakfast and 24 hour coffee. Breakfast a bit busy some mornings although a lot of school trips staying at the time. Brilliant location for International drive just a short walk through the hotel car park turn left and you are at Wonderworks a bit further and your at Pointe Orlando. Definitely stay here again, If you are doing Disney/Universal on a budget the Hampton Inns are the way to do it!!!! The pool was clean but the sunbeds could do with replacing. Laundrette on site which needed key to entry which was very handy

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: Steve G
Reviews.Content: This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel, last visit was 2008. It has maintained its standards throughout this time, and our stay this time was just as good. Clean hotel, friendly staff and good location. Away from the bustle of I Drive itself it is still perfectly siuated. The staff could not be more helpful. Complimentary breakfast buffet is good, nice pool and internet access all helped to make this a great holiday. For those with young families however there is only the pool to keep them occupied if they still have energy after the parks! They seem to strike a good balance between the tourist and business visitor.

Reviews.Title: “We had a very good time”
Reviews.Author: CÃ©sar D
Reviews.Content: We feel very confortable, in all areas of the hotel, it is clean, and the people it is very kind. We had all the facilities that we need for a vacations time. Regards,

Reviews.Title: “I like staying at this Hampton”
Reviews.Author: davechri
Reviews.Content: We've stayed here several times and I like it a lot. The hotel itself is modern and clean. They do a really great job considering how many guests roll through Orlando. Great breakfast. Large breakfast area that, even with the substantial number of tables, can fill up in the mornings. The rooms have always been clean, comfortable, and quiet. I've never had a noise issue here, even when at capacity. This hotel is not directly on International Drive, but I-Drive is a short walk and there are a lot of restaurants, bars, and shopping available within walking distance.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Ian G
Reviews.Content: We have just returned from two weeks at this hotel and can confirm that the excellent reviews are fully justified. Every part of the hotel is spotlessly clean, the rooms are a decent size with fantastic air conditioning. The coffee in the rooms was nice as well. All staff were friendly and helpful and the location was perfect as it was just off International Drive and Pointe Orlando which made it quieter than other hotels located directly around these locations. The complementary breakfast was a welcome addition as this saved between $20/$30 a day which adds up over a two week holiday. Free tea and coffee is also available at any time in reception along with fresh cookies if you can get there before they are gone !! The only suggestions we could make is that they supply a safe and refrigerator in the rooms and maybe vary the hot items available for breakfast, although as it is free you can hardly complain about this. Overall we would thoroughly reccommend this hotel and will definately stay here again on our next visit to Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “We had great stay at the hotel, the staff are really helpful.”
Reviews.Author: Linda B
Reviews.Content: We returned today from a wonderful holiday in Orlando. We stayed for two weeks at the Hampton Inn and were really pleased with the cleanliness of the accommodation and were impressed with the helpfulness of the friendly staff. We requested a safety deposit box and refrigerator but although they weren't available immediately, the following day we were provided with both. The complimentary breakfast was sufficient and it was lovely to be able to have hot tea or coffee in the reception area after returning from a day at the parks. My husband and I hope to stay at this hotel again in the future.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel.”
Reviews.Author: wales45
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel in May/June 2010 for 12 nights, and also late October/early November 2010 whilst in Florida for the cancelled launch of the Space Shuttle Discovery. I returned with my son in February 2011 when the launch finally went ahead. Unfortunately we stayed at another hotel on that occasion and it really brought home to me how good the Hampton Inn is. The staff are friendly, the rooms are clean and comfortable and the pool area is excellent. On occasions last year it seemed like our own private pool as there was nobody else out there! A really big bonus is the excellent breakfast which is free to guests. After having to go out and pay each day at our other hotel in February, I can vouch for how much better the Hampton breakfast is. If I had to pick one thiong that could be improved it would be new equipment in the fitness room as what is there is old and not very good. I would definitely book this hotel when I return to Orlando and it must be said it is within walking distance to may good bars and restaurants.

Reviews.Title: “Made our vacation that much better! We enjoyed our stay immensely!”
Reviews.Author: beachbum100017
Reviews.Content: We had no trouble finding our room, and the room was very clean and comfortable. The bed was so comfortable that I wanted to find one like it for my home. The staff was very friendly and helpful, and the continental breakfast was very good, and different every morning. We will definately use Hampton Inn Hotels again.

Reviews.Title: “One of Orlando's gems !”
Reviews.Author: FloridaBob2011
Reviews.Content: I have just returned today from our great trip to the sunshine state. Me and my family have been very fortunate to have visited Florida many times over the past twenty years.We have stayed in hotels on I-drive,Kissimee as well as the usuall villas.Our last three holidays (2007,2010 and 2011) have been at the Hampton inn. Yes we should have written reviews before but being selfish we wanted to keep this hotel to "ourselves" but we know feel the need to leave the hotel and staff a review. Our party usually consists of myself,my wife and son plus my mother in law and her friend.We find the location superb being away from the tacky end of I-drive but close enough to safely walk to great restaurants and shops asweell as close to all major routes.The hotel is VERY well kept but the best part is the staff.Stuart and Robert (the managers) lead by example with a friendly and personal approach which is followed by ALL the staff. Whilst staying here this time we bumped into several other families whom we had seen before on our previous visits.Surely all the repeat business most say something. Once again a BIG thank you and we WILL see you again next year!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Spider666
Reviews.Content: Great hotel, I have stayed here a few times May 2011 being last time for normally 2 to 3 weeks at a time to use as a base for the Theme Parks. The hotel has always been very clean and staff always friendly. i love the location away from I-Drive but only a 2min walk though so it's were i want to be without the noise of I-Drive. Only 5 mins walk to Pointe Orlando too. Would stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Connecting Rooms not available after promised”
Reviews.Author: qikvette
Reviews.Content: I traveled with a small group of friends to this hotel for a ladies night out. Two members of our party had both called and spoken with management several days before our arrival regarding the group having connecting rooms. We were assured that was not a problem, however upon check in, none were available. 1/2 of our group was on one end of this hotel and the other right by the elevator (something else that was requested we not be near). Apparently, either the clerk or management decided our requests were not worthwhile. They attempted to appease us by giving the group snack baskets and a small discount on both rooms....nice try.....but not overly impressive for a Hampton Inn. I will say the rooms were very clean and the hotel quiet and we did get a good nights rest but our night out would have been much more enjoyable had they followed through with their promises.

Reviews.Title: “Disney Vacation”
Reviews.Author: natrat04
Reviews.Content: My family stayed at this hotel for our Disney Vacation from 7/9/11 to 7/16/11. Our room was clean upon arrival and the housekeeping staff was excellent as was the entire staff from check in to check out. The breakfast bar was very good. Beds were comfortable and the Hotel was peaceful after a long day at the parks. The location was great, only 10 minutes from Downtown Disney and close to everything. We would recommend this hotel to anyone.

Reviews.Title: “Big rooms..good location..small price...Sure would use again”
Reviews.Author: lassie79
Reviews.Content: This one is a real treasure.... Spacious rooms with wonderfull comfy beds and easy chairs. There was a large pool outside. The rooms had a fridge which we did have to ask for but they bought it up no problem and the air cond worked great. Breakfast was included and had a good selection of hot and cold items. Free coffee all day and night was a bonus in the dinning room and they even supplied a microwave to nuke stuff you bought in. Easy to get to International Dr just walk up the side of the hotel and through the car park, where the bus runs from to all the prime outlets (by the tickets in Wallgreen). There are lots of good places to eat the Big Kahuna on Int. Dr was amazing value so cheap and so much of it, we went twice it was so good. The hotel provided a driver with van to drop you off at the attractions who was really great and rates cheaper than a cab, around $12 to universal studios. There was plenty of parking for free at the hotel. I would certainly recommend this hotel on all counts for a stay in orlando, without the big price.

Reviews.Title: “It was good”
Reviews.Author: SR2327
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very close to Universal Studios. Easily located. The room were good. We booked King size Non Smoking room through expedia. But when we reached, everything was sold out and we were given smoking room. The smell was terrible. But the lady in the front desk gave us some room sprays and said she would change the room the next day. So we had no other choice but we got our room changed the next morning. Breakfast was ok. Nothing great though. The hotel was clean. Had enough parking space. They offer shuttles to universal and walt disney but not complimentary. Since we had our car, we did not utilise it. On the whole, the stay was good.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic”
Reviews.Author: Stumpy19
Reviews.Content: My wife and I shared our honeymoon experience with the wonderful staff at the Hampton Inn Orlando. From the moment Stuart checked us in, we knew this hotel was going to be special. Our room was clean, spacious, and comfortable. The staff was friendly and went above and beyond to ensure our stay was special. Pedro greeted us every morning with a smile and a full buffet breakfast. Our favourite aspect of the hotel was it's location to all the major theme parks! A great hotel... will return when we have kids to share in the memories with.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL FREINDLY STAFF”
Reviews.Author: derrum
Reviews.Content: i stayed here for 2 weeks with my wife and 2 year old daughter in june 2011.when i arrived the staff were very freindly and checked us in very quickly.The room was much like any other similler priced hotels on i drive (this was my 8th trip to orlando so can compare against others)but it was very clean and the beds are super comfy.They do a free breakfast witch was very nice at the begging of the holiday but went down hill during the 2 weeks but it was never terrible.the staff are very freindly including the cleaners who where really nice and chatty they are a big credit to the hotel.the location is perfect its not acually on i drive but set back between i drive and another rd buy its like a 2 min walk to idrive.the only down side is there is only 1 pool witch is a little small but never busy.i had a great time the hotel felt save and freindly when i go back i will definetly be staying at this hotel

Reviews.Title: “Just average”
Reviews.Author: TheladyLisa
Reviews.Content: We stayed here in 2009 and loved this hotel - I left a great review. This time, we were all disappointed. There were no safety deposit boxes available for the first day, which meant we had to carry all our valuables around. I was told they had a list of people waiting for them. The staff were all just as friendly as before, yet the place feels tired. Our bathroom tub tap began leaking the day we arrived and we complained a few days later once it had become a running torrent that was keeping us awake. Nothing was done. We complained again a week later and it was fixed that day, but surely the maid who cleaned the bathroom every day should have reported it even if we hadn't? Doubt we'll return.

Reviews.Title: “little gem”
Reviews.Author: gee62
Reviews.Content: stay here every year , not for our whole vacation as we travel to the gulf coast , but before and after our trip to the beach ,It has to be one of the easiest hotels to find after airport , take exit for international drive convention centre, and go onto universal blvd which is the road that runs behind international drive, good clean hotel , with free breakfast ,friendly staff , good size bedrooms and walking distance threw car park to international drive , and pointe orlando ,[ an area with bars clubs restaurants, and a imax cinema] I would class hotel as agood three star ,For those that don,t drive , everthing you need is within walking distance , and for those trips to the outlets etc a trolleys bus, is available,

Reviews.Title: “THE BEST HOTEL WE HAVE STAYED IN WHILST IN ORLANDO”
Reviews.Author: DAVEColchesterUk
Reviews.Content: Excellent Location....Ideal for those who have cars.On Universal Boulevard just behind International Drive... Can drive or walk through from car park. Excellent "Free" Breakfasts ...Quality of Food Service and Restaurant Excellent Sleep Quality No noise from other rooms Comfotable beds ..we had 2 Queen Beds in each room Functional Swiimming Pool Stayed last week for a week with the family. This is a very good hotel to stay ...Not too big or small Offers an excellent "base" whils in Orlando In and out very easily Excellent Service and Value Usually pick a hotel with the Free breakfasts as extra value with the children in tow These "free" breakfasts are the best we have ever had ! WIll book up again when next in Orlando ... A REAL GEM

Reviews.Title: “Business Travelers BEWARE”
Reviews.Author: boars919
Reviews.Content: I stayed here one night this week. I arrived at 5:30PM to be informed my room was not ready. So insted of making me wait they gave me "the next best thing." A handicaped accesableROOM next to the "gym" that HAD A SMELL OF VOMIT. Traveling for business I must wake up early, but htis was made difficult due to the SMELL IN THE ROOM, the TV in the"gym" blairing loud until I shut it off (after 11PM) and was told by the front desk that the gym is open until midnight. After a terrrible night tossing and turning in sheets that I question as being clean? I jumped into a shower with pink/yellow MOLD ON THE SHOWER HEAD. I am sure this is a great place for families (place starting to show the look of many families staying there) but as a business person I WILL NEVER STAY THERE AGAIN. There are to many choices in the I-Drive area to put up with that SUB STANDARD ROOM AND SERVICE. GOOD LUCK STAYING THERE

Reviews.Title: “An excellent deal”
Reviews.Author: Souzaac
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very good to stay with family. It has a good room, well furnished, a friendly staff and a good breakfast (rare in US hotels). When I stayed there the price was low compared to a similar hotel. It worths a lot. Free park lot. It's close to Universal.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: ericst1138
Reviews.Content: I stayed there wile in Orlando for Star Wars Celebration V. The rooms were a bit small for two people but the rooms were super clean.The Beds were nice .The staff was very helpful and the free Wi-Fi and very nice free breakfast made the trip all the better.. Over all I would stay there again and was very happy with my stay..

Reviews.Title: “Great value.”
Reviews.Author: drjekyll
Reviews.Content: Stayed one night only, but always love Hampton Inns because of comfortable beds, free (good!) breakfast, free parking, free internet, free newspaper and pool. We were able to be placed on the same floor as friends of ours and it was quiet at night. Got our wake up call as expected and not a single problem. I had an outstanding travel deal as well, so the value is outstanding. Stayed elsewhere, which was great, butwould have had to spend an extra 100 to get what was free here.

Reviews.Title: “Happy Staff”
Reviews.Author: YVRtoN
Reviews.Content: Because of a mechanical plane issue I had to cancel at the last minute one night of a four night reservation, and they did not charge me even though the policy when I booked was 72 hours notice. Cookies, coffee or tea in the lobby, hearty breakfast, wifi in the rooms, computer and printing in the lobby all included makes for a pleasant and hassle free stay. Easy walk to restaurants. Rooms are a little run down, but clean. Super happy and helpful staff makes for a nice experience. A great place to stay while on business.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel, friendly, excellent location, a joy to stay here”
Reviews.Author: mikeymikey1234
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for a week of parks and shopping... Rooms clean, tidy and spacious. Free breakfast very good, plenty of choice. Staff very friendly and helpful. Perfectly positioned between Universal blvd and I-Drive. Would defo return to this hotel...

Reviews.Title: “Good business hotel!”
Reviews.Author: NoleGirl0923
Reviews.Content: This was perfect for my one night business trip. It was clean, staff was friendly, great location, and comfy beds. The biggest downfall was that there was a HUGE group there and they were taking up all of the common areas at any given time of the day. I couldn't get near the continental breakfast because there was just too many people in that small space. Not really the hotel's fault, necessarily, but just a little annoying. It is right next to the convention center so large groups are to be expected, I suppose. I also had an issue getting online in the hotel, which doesn't bode well for a business traveler, but I worked through it. With all of the choices around, I felt like this was a great value in a great location.

Reviews.Title: “A great location with lots to do”
Reviews.Author: gigrant
Reviews.Content: We didn't really stay in the hotel much as we were enjoying the theme parks and other activities around, but when we were in the hotel the service was excellent, staff friendly, clean, breakfast was very nice and overall great value for money. At evening time when choosing our dinner we were spoilt for choice as just behind the hotel there is a large variety of restaurants and even 10 minutes either way there was lots to choose from. It happens to also be by the i-ride bus stops green and red lines and in truth was only the i-ride buses that let down a great holiday due to their irregular timing and waiting a long time for one to appear. That pretty much sums up our holiday experience and would strongly recommend the hotel to anyone who are going to theme parks and other activities

Reviews.Title: “Very good except fitness room”
Reviews.Author: MikeDelRio
Reviews.Content: Location is great, rooms are clean, and breakfast is excellent. I marked it down one star though because their fitness room was poor. Half the equipment didn't work and the thermostat didn't work despite several visits from staff to look at it.

Reviews.Title: “Far above average Hampton Inn”
Reviews.Author: ED5611
Reviews.Content: I generally like to stay in Hampton Inns because (with one exception) I have never been disappointed. Hampton Inn Orlando - Convention Center is far above average Hampton. Hotel is very clean, staff is nice, welcoming and friendly and the breakfast is very good compared with "Hampton standard".

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Service!”
Reviews.Author: MJD1602
Reviews.Content: The staff were kind, curious and very accommodating. The rooms were comfortable and the complementary breakfast was good. I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “great staff,great location and lovely cookies”
Reviews.Author: wormley
Reviews.Content: This hotel offers great quality clean rooms and the staff are fantastic with nothing too much trouble.Pool area never busy as many of the business men staying did not use the pool so we had it to ourselves quite a lot. No noise in the rooms or corridors of an evening so no disturbed sleep after busy days in the parks. Also keep an eye out for the free cookies on the reception desk they were delicious!!

Reviews.Title: “The most recommanded hotel I ever stayed”
Reviews.Author: frog2011
Reviews.Content: I stayed in many hotels and Tripadvisor is the website I must to check before booking. Anyway, I had never bothered to write any review. In Apr 2011, we stayed 1 week in this hotel. I felt I own applaud to it. In general, the hostel is the most recommended hotel I every stayed. The room is clean and spacey, staffs are friendly, etc. Here is some highlight. The location is convenient. If you have car, commute won't be an issue for you. If you don't, it's very easy to take the public transaction. iRide stop is on the left of the hotel. And it only takes 3 minutes to walk to the International street. You just need to go around the building and passing the parking lot to the International street. The detail instruction is, turn left immediately after the main entry. (Don't go to Universal street.), And turn left again. Basically, you're still on the hotel's parking lot. Just go straight to the backend of the hotel and continue. You will pass another parking lot then meet the International street. There are plenty of restaurants, entertainments and supermarkets in 5 minutes walking distance, like Wonder works, Stake house, Boston Lobster, Ming Court... My room is very quite maybe because it's far away to the street. Anyway, Universal street is not a busy street at all, so it's a big plus. The biggest highlight is the complimentary hot breakfast, which is the best I ever got. And it's even better than most paid breakfast from other hotels. There are 2 hot entries and they change everyday. For value, it's pretty good in my case but my case is special. My rate is the special rate so it may not account to you. Another special event was that the hotel waived one night fee for us. On the 2nd night of our stay, a group checked in late and they stayed in the same floor as us. There were energizing kids and loud people. They talked aloud in the hallway, they shut their door heavily and they run back and forth among rooms. So we complained to the front desk on the next morning. In other hotel, we maybe moved to other room. In this hotel, they waived that night for us when we checked out. The front desk told us that's their way to keep 100% satisfaction from guests. It sure wins mine. I gave 5 for everything except the room. There is no refrigerator in my room. The hotel booklet mentioned that a handful rooms have it and we didn't bother to ask since we don't want to change room.

Reviews.Title: “Hampton Inn Convention Center is Perfect Location Near I-Drive”
Reviews.Author: wutsnext
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at many of the hotels in Orlando including Disney & Universal hotels as well as several on I-Drive. Hampton Inn Convention Center is outstanding. I booked a room for a 3 night stay and they took care of all requests. The room was clean, comfortable and more than affordable. The location is terrific just a 4-5 minute walk thru the numerous hotel/restaurant parking lots to I-Drive and everything you could need. Millers Ale House, TGIFs, Bahama Breeze, Olive Garden, Friendlys, Subway, Dennys and Pizza Hut all within 5 minutes. Then Walgreens and the Pointe Plaza Mall with shops and more restaurants Hooters, Johnny Rockets, Canyon Grill, Tommy Bahama, etc. There are 2 mini golf courses either way and the I-Trolly. The hotels uses a car service for the airport which was excellent. You can also get a taxi to Universal Studios for $10 each way. The breakfast was quite surprising with fresh cut fruit, fresh fruit, yoqurt, cereal, muffins, bagels, pastries, waffles, eggs, bacon or sausage, juices, coffee, etc. More than enough choices and served 6am - 10am. The pool was also outstanding all day sun, which a lot of hotels nearby do not have, and always lounge chairs and umbrelled tables available. It is also open until 11:00pm. The hotel seemed to have 50/50 business and vacationers and even a couple of buses with high school students which I never saw or heard. I would definitely stay at this hotel again and highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Had a wonderful stay”
Reviews.Author: Keeling
Reviews.Content: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The staff were very friendly and went out of their way to help if you had a query. The hotel and rooms were clean and the cleaners did a good job. The breakfasts were handy and there was always a choice such as cereals, toast, waffles, omelettes etc. Having free internet was also brilliant because we could e-mail family to let them know how we were getting on. We had a mid afternoon pick up for the airport and they let us keep the room on which we thought was brilliant so we could freshen up before we came home. There were always plenty of seats by the pool and the cookies every afternoon were absolutely deeeeeelicious. It is only a five minute walk to International Drive. We have stayed at various hotels and suites in the International Drive area and we would definitely stay here again when we are next in Florida. No complaints whatsoever and can't wait to go back. Thank you for a lovely holiday.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay - Great Staff”
Reviews.Author: HistoryGirl09
Reviews.Content: This hotel has the perfect location and great service. We spent 6 nights on spring break. Located right on Int'l Blvd you can get many places by using the trolley system. Very close to Universal, Sea World and Wet n Wild. About $40 for cab to Disney (hotel does offer limited shuttle service at a fee as well). Breakfast has many more items than most hotels and has two hot entries each morning we were there. Business Center in lobby for printing our boarding passes and free wi-fi in rooms. Room amenities included mouthwash and lotion (in addition to standard shampoo/conditioner). The breakfast staff was great. Front desk is outstanding. We arrived about the middle of the night and left very early and that staff was good. During our stay I seeked assistance for directions, transportation and help arranging car rental and they did a fabulous job! Even warm cookies each evening. Very pleasant stay - and I was traveling with 3 teenagers! Don't forget to visit the World's Best McDonalds down the street - literally - the best!

Reviews.Title: “Best Service In Florida.”
Reviews.Author: buffy333Florida
Reviews.Content: When we checked in, we were told that Priceline had booked us a smoking room and the hotel was booked up. Since we were already charged for the room, we thought that we would loose our money & room, but Brittany, the desk clerk took us to the smoking floor to check out the 4 vacant rooms to see if any of them were "smoke free" enough that we could stay the night. We found one that wasn't bad, turned on fan and air conditioner and went to the park. When we returned, most of the smoke smell was gone. My husband and I were very impressed that Brittany took the time to accommodate us with a friendly, pleasant personality. The other staff was friendly and pleasant as well.. The room was clean, confortable bed and the breakfast was great. Free parking a plus. Best location for everything in Orlando and not on the extremely busy roads. There was nothing bad about this hotel!

Reviews.Title: “Great location, staff, and cleanliness”
Reviews.Author: ams07t
Reviews.Content: Being a manager of a hotel, I am scrupulous when traveling. The Hampton Inn at the Orlando Convention Center was clean, it had a wonderful central location, and the staff were very helpful. If ever in the Orlando are, I will be sure to stay again. -CR Governors Inn Tallahassee, FL

Reviews.Title: “superb”
Reviews.Author: dazza73
Reviews.Content: stayed for 12 nights in january, fantastic value all round.free wi fi,even in your room. Darren our son was right at home,back in Scotland with his friends i think. service and attention to detail,EXCELLENT.going back for Xmas and Newyear,cant wait .Also tea and coffee plus homemade cookies free 24/7.well done Hampton.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful experience, very clean and great location.”
Reviews.Author: annary0627
Reviews.Content: I was king of nervous because I booked it with Hot Wire, but as soon as I stepped into the lobby I knew it was going to be just fine. The staff was very friendly, our room with 2 full beds was very spacious and super clean. The bathroom very clean and comfortable. My daughters and grandaughter were very happy, especially with the breakfast. It was amazing, with a great selection of things to choose from. I highly recommed it and I will certainly go back.

Reviews.Title: “Our holiday was made all the better by our stay here”
Reviews.Author: charmaine15
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel April 2009 and found it to be lovely and clean, the staff were very helpful, lovely clean laundy room, and the breakfast 2nd to none. Synthia the waitress is so helpful nothing is to much trouble for her. Have stayed in Orlando before at another hotel and it was horrid so this 1 was a very plesant surprise. Was so impressed were back this year 31st March 2011 cant wait.

Reviews.Title: “Can't wait to go back!!”
Reviews.Author: nickiegiggles
Reviews.Content: I cannot fault this hotel at all. The reception staff were excellent and attentive. Our rooms were spotless and the beds were so comfy we didn't want to get out of them!!! We will definately go back.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Stay, Great Hotel!!”
Reviews.Author: carolineaciely
Reviews.Content: I went to Orlando with my family for 2 weeks ( 5 people total ) and we really loved our stay in this hotel! When we first got there, the AC in my parents room was not working very well, so as soon as I called the reception they sent a guy to check on it and not even 5 minutes later my parents had already been given another room. The staff people were very friendly and helpful whenever we needed them. Breakfast is great and everyday at 6pm they have delicious warm cookies for the guests for free! The price is very low compared to other hotels in the area and in the same category as Hampton Inn, plus the location is amazing... 5 minutes walk to the International Drive , close to many great restaurants and tourist atractions, but donÂ´t worry about the noise, because there is none! We all here recommend this wonderful hotel! This was our 2nd year going to Orlando and when we go back, we well be staying there again ,for sure!

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel - excellent staff - very friendly”
Reviews.Author: The4Atkinsons
Reviews.Content: Had a fantastic holiday with the family. The hotel is located just off International Drive so its quiet but only a couple of minutes walk to international drive for shopping and restaurants. The staff are all friendly and nothing is ever too much trouble for them. The kids (10 & 7) were really looked after! The room was clean and linen and towels were changed regularly. As many of the guests are conference goers, the pool was never busy. The breakfast buffet was perfect, hot and cold food and drinks available which really set us up for a busy day at the parks. We enjoyed it so much we have booked again to return next November !!

Reviews.Title: “Clean smell, nice breakfast, friendly staff, could have a better gym”
Reviews.Author: ivelissed
Reviews.Content: I loved the smell of clean when I got in my room! The bed was very comfortable. Nice free breakfast in the mornings. The staff was very helpful. The only room for improvement that I noticed was that the gym had really old machines that were very noisy.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Galaxy613
Reviews.Content: Great all around hotel! Polite staff and nice accommodations. Fellow business/convention travelers, A few tips to make your stay more comfortable. 1. Ask for a fridge. They're not in every room, but there are a few available at no cost. Some rooms also have microwaves. 2. Stay on the first floor. The elevators are really slow and can be quite annoying. 3. Bring your own coffee mug. I stayed for 10 nights, so the tips I've provided are geared towards a lengthy stay. Either way, this hotel is in a great location and perfect for long stays.

Reviews.Title: “Front Desk Manager -Horrible- as advertised on TA”
Reviews.Author: rincon413
Reviews.Content: I've stayed at many Hampton Inns. we called ahead to make sure that they had a full size crib available for a 16 month old. aside from initially telling us that it would be impossible to get one we were assured that we would have the much needed crib. upon arrival we found an infant's crib in our room; the manager Angelika was extremely rude to us and would not lift a finger to resolve the problem. we drove 30 minutes and rented a crib and when we brought it back to the hotel the head of housekeeping cleaned the crib and told us that they could have provided us with a similar one. no thanks to the hotel manager. the only reason I would consider using a hampton in the future is becasue the head of housekeeping was so nice.

Reviews.Title: “Superb Hotel in fantastic location”
Reviews.Author: June1069
Reviews.Content: We stayed from 8th-20th October this year and loved everything about this hotel. All staff are friendly and very helpful - they all seemed to enjoy working together.
